mapper.update: update d_stolenfire set stolenfireid=stolenfireid ,stolenfiretype=#{stolenfiretype} ,occurtime=#{occurtime} ,occurarea=#{occurarea} ,processcause=#{processcause} ,lossmoney=#{lossmoney} ,dealresult=#{dealresult} ,createuserid=#{createuserid} where stolenfireid=#{stolenfireid}

update d_stolenfire set stolenfireid=stolenfireid ,stolenfiretype=#{stolenfiretype} ,occurtime=#{occurtime} ,occurarea=#{occurarea} ,processcause=#{processcause} ,lossmoney=#{lossmoney} ,dealresult=#{dealresult} ,groupid=#{groupid} ,companyid=#{companyid} ,graindepotid=#{graindepotid} ,createtime=#{createtime} ,createuserid=#{createuserid} where 1=1 and stolenfireid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and stolenfireid =#{Where_Id} and stolenfireid=#{Where_stolenfireid} and stolenfiretype=#{Where_stolenfiretype} and occurtime=#{Where_occurtime} and occurarea=#{Where_occurarea} and processcause=#{Where_processcause} and lossmoney=#{Where_lossmoney} and dealresult=#{Where_dealresult} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid} and createtime=#{Where_createtime} and createuserid=#{Where_createuserid}
mapper.select: select t.stolenfireid "stolenfireid", t.stolenfiretype "stolenfiretype", t.occurtime "occurtime", t.occurarea "occurarea", t.processcause "processcause", t.lossmoney "lossmoney", t.dealresult "dealresult", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.createtime "createtime", t.createuserid "createuserid" from d_stolenfire t where stolenfireid=#{stolenfireid}

select t.stolenfireid "stolenfireid", t.stolenfiretype "stolenfiretype", t.occurtime "occurtime", t.occurarea "occurarea", t.processcause "processcause", t.lossmoney "lossmoney", t.dealresult "dealresult", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.createtime "createtime", t.createuserid "createuserid" from d_stolenfire t where 1=1 and t.stolenfireid=#{stolenfireid} and t.stolenfiretype=#{stolenfiretype} and t.occurtime=#{occurtime} and t.occurarea=#{occurarea} and t.processcause=#{processcause} and t.lossmoney=#{lossmoney} and t.dealresult=#{dealresult} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid}

select t.stolenfireid "stolenfireid", t.stolenfiretype "stolenfiretype", t.occurtime "occurtime", t.occurarea "occurarea", t.processcause "processcause", t.lossmoney "lossmoney", t.dealresult "dealresult", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.createtime "createtime", t.createuserid "createuserid" from d_stolenfire t where 1=1 and t.stolenfireid=#{stolenfireid} and t.stolenfiretype=#{stolenfiretype} and t.occurtime=#{occurtime} and t.occurarea=#{occurarea} and t.processcause=#{processcause} and t.lossmoney=#{lossmoney} and t.dealresult=#{dealresult} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid}
mapper.delete: delete from d_stolenfire where 1=1 and stolenfireid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and stolenfireid =#{Where_Id} and stolenfireid=#{Where_stolenfireid} and stolenfiretype=#{Where_stolenfiretype} and occurtime=#{Where_occurtime} and occurarea=#{Where_occurarea} and processcause=#{Where_processcause} and lossmoney=#{Where_lossmoney} and dealresult=#{Where_dealresult} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid} and createtime=#{Where_createtime} and createuserid=#{Where_createuserid}
mapper.select: select t.stolenfireid "stolenfireid", t.stolenfiretype "stolenfiretype", t.occurtime "occurtime", t.occurarea "occurarea", t.processcause "processcause", t.lossmoney "lossmoney", t.dealresult "dealresult", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.createtime "createtime", t.createuserid "createuserid" from d_stolenfire t where 1=1 and t.stolenfireid=#{stolenfireid} and t.stolenfiretype=#{stolenfiretype} and t.occurtime=#{occurtime} and t.occurarea=#{occurarea} and t.processcause=#{processcause} and t.lossmoney=#{lossmoney} and t.dealresult=#{dealresult} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid}

select count(*) from d_stolenfire t where 1=1 and t.stolenfireid=#{stolenfireid} and t.stolenfireid!=#{NoId} and t.stolenfiretype=#{stolenfiretype} and t.occurtime=#{occurtime} and t.occurarea=#{occurarea} and t.processcause=#{processcause} and t.lossmoney=#{lossmoney} and t.dealresult=#{dealresult} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid}
